translation.next_time_app: Try the mobile app for the full experience!
translation.call_back: Call back or reactivate the link.
translation.microphone_access: You must grant access to your microphone before you can use it.
translation.microphone_access_denied: Update your permissions, then refresh the page.
translation.microphone_access_error: An error occured, check that the microphone is not in use by another application and refresh the page.
translation.camera_access_denied: You must grant access to your camera before you can use it.
translation.camera_access_error: An error occured, check that the camera is not in use by another application and refresh the page.
translation.twincode_error: The Click-to-Call link you entered seems invalid.
translation.audio_call_activity_hangup_confirmation: Do you want to hangup the call?
translation.audio_call_activity_terminate_revoked: Call terminated: {{contactName}} has revoked this identity
